France: Theuderic died. Charles Martel was prevented succession.
Germany: Battle of Avignon: Charles breached and burned the Umayyad-held city of Avignon. Battle of Narbonne (737): Charles besieged but failed to capture the Umayyad-held city of Narbonne.
